Package uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.item

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Square
    This is the interface for game board squares
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    This class creates a board on the UI out of buttons attached to squares objects it also tracks the lines created by noughts and crosses
    Dice
    This class generates the roll of a 6-sided dice
    Line
    This class represents a line of OXSquare's with a direction it also tracks the length and the player
    Location
    This class represents the UI position and size of a UI item
    OXSquare
    This class implements Square it sets the selection behaviour it adds merging lines and defines a constructor
    SLSquare
    This class implements Square it sets the selection behaviour it defines a constructor
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Line.direction  
    Line.endsFree
